Hill\'ffair is the annual cultural extravaganza of NIT Hamirpur, filling zeal and enthusiasm in the hearts of every NITian
App Team introduces Quiz 3.0 with mind boggling and challenging questions!
Real time newsfeed of all the exciting events happening around. Don\'t have to miss any!
App team is introducing various polls this Hillffair. Stay tuned and vote for the best !!
Will never miss another update with our android notifications.
You\'re all set to have a great Hill\'ffair this year!

A Open Source Project by AppTeam NITH for Cultural Festival Hillffair 2k17.

Source code available at GitHub

 	Load Toast
*Make sure to read all instructions before attempting the quiz

* Keep yourself updated with all the happenings of HILL'FFAIR 2k17.

 * Add your Hill'ffair Activities along with a description and image of same.

 * Add important news and announcement of various events organised during Hill'ffair.

 * Exciting cash prizes for the posts with maximum likes.

It is a name which needs no introduction up here in the hills, it is the reason why most of northern India awaits the month of November, it is the name whose mention alone excites the listener to his core. 

Hill’ffair is around the corner once again. And needless to say, it promises to be more extravagant this year than ever before. 

In the age where fests are in a perennial quest to provide all who bear witness an unforgettable and worth cherishing experience, Hill’ffair has become synonymous with exhilarating joy and excitement that knows no bounds. 

With its unique theme, “Inceptio” this year, Hill’ffair 2017 promises a journey into the world of fantasy, where imagination knows no bounds and where the intellect gains its ultimate ecstasy. 

A journey through the animated joys of the world, which is destined to leave you spell bounded, a chance to watch those fantasies come alive and to relish the unreal.

 So now you know where you have to be this November!!!

NIT Hamirpur and its hospitality awaits you. Come watch the magic unfold at NIT Hamirpur.

Please read below instruction very carefully:-

 1. This quiz is hosted by AppTeam of NIT Hamirpur.

 2. Important: Make sure that your device remains connected to Internet while attempting quiz.

 3. Make sure that all personal information about you in current account is correct, otherwise you may be disqualified.

 4. When you enter the quiz, you will be provided with a set of 10 randomly chosen questions.

 5. Each question is unique and will not appear again. 

 6. Their is no negative marking for wrong answer, so it is better to attempt all questions. And for correct answer you will be provided one point.

 7. Important: Time limit to attempt a set of question is 2 minutes. 
You have to finish the quiz in 2 minutes to make your score count.

 8. After attempting all questions press finish button to submit your inputs. After 2 minutes, inputs will automatically gets submitted.

 9. Do not close app after starting quiz, because you will be given only one attempt to each set of questions.

 10. After clicking on submit you will be shown only score corresponding to that set of questions.

 11. Advice: Attempt as many sets possible to score more points.

 12. Winners will be announced after Hill'ffair 2017, and will be rewarded.

 13. For any queries/complaints/bugs, contact us at appteam.nith@gmail.com
